dupathaka sanskruthiya wisin nirmanaya karapu duppath ha`gimak saha mahadwipika sanskruthiyakin nirmanaya wunu (api aanayanaya kala) pohosath ha`gimak athara wenasa.
ma dutuwe gaha ganna pasal sisun dede­neki.
bharathayata nakath labune lankawe yaksha gothrikayangen yayi mama wishwasa karami.
kotas ganna kochchara uwamanawak thibbada ooke kerena keruwawa melo deyak therune nathi nisa kawadawath kotasakwath aran naha.
indiyawa ho kisidu ratakata wenath rajyayak...
eheth eewa gana wage wagak nathi aya kawi liyayi.
wenna massinalayi unge set eekayi neluwa mata thorana handiye.
dewmini dariyage prarthana itu karamin sathiyak athulatha nawa niwesata mul galath thabayi..!
pasu giya awasana dashaka gananawa thula chitha්rapati nishpadanaya thula dis wu barapathala parihaniya samaja pa්rathigamithwaye kala parichchedayak samaga sampatha wiya.
honda singarsla dennek thundenekuth set karaganna oona.
me bawa dharmapradipikawa nam granthaye sandahan we.

pasuwa owun ayata erehiwa polis sanwidhanathmaka aparadha kottashayata idiripath kara athi paminillata sakshi labadima sandaha polis mulasthanayata paminena bawayi ehi maha lekam pujya magalkande sudaththa himiyan kiya sitiye.
man hoya gaththa eewa kale kawuda kiyala.
uuwa paradina pakshaye desapalana anagathaya ethanin iwaraya kiyapu wicharakayo dan mokada kiyanne , kohama wunath anthimata parajaya ne labune .
"wasudewa - me aanduwath yanne adhirajyawadi mawathemayi.api hadanne emagin mudawala niwaradi magata ganna.
ganu lamayekta dawaddata mashimak oonamayi.
sidura) warthagatha thorathuru labaganima sandaha lowa wadima washayen bhawitha wana anthar jalaye wishwa koshaya wana
kula mala, wansha pelapath nama thamayi eyage speshaliti eka.
indiya dhiwarayin pirisakata shri lankika dhiwarayin pirisakagen praharayak ella wi thibe. 0
ithin oya samasthayama gaththama fantasi godak widiyata hithala thamayi man meka liwwe ..
puththalama disthrik manthri priyankara jayarathna mahatha mulasunata paminiyeya
anith de thamayi me wade nawaththanna pradeshiya sabhawata saha adala nisi aayathanawalata kisima uwamanawak nathikama.
rasika rasikawiyan widiyata awith noyek yojana karana widihe manasika asahanayen pelena ayath muhunupotha haraha mata muna gahila thiyenawa.
man eekata punchi karanayak oyagollanta pennana kamathiyi.
namuth ithin sama daruwekma, biriyakma samiyekma me aniyam premakulakaye samajikayo kiya api nokiyamu.
yas raj..mamath ekangayi..palaweni mach eke sangage gahilla mal masuran unata anthimata mach eka epauna..kisima aathal ekak na..deweni eka ehema neweyi..tikak thibba eeke gathiyak..
ada thamayi mulinma aawe ...

hamudawe niladharinge hamuda thorathuru, usaswim, maruwim, rajakari katayuthu saha wenath ewani thorathuru pracharaya sandaha hamuda nila webadawi pawathwagena yayi.hamudawala rahasyabhawaya, gaurawaya, winaya saha wenath nithirithiwalata yatathwa ihala niladhariyakuge adhikshanaya yatathe ema nila webadawiya pawathwagena yayi.eheth hamuda samajikayan kisidu simawakin thorawa ihatha sandahan paridi owunge paudgalika fesbuk, antharjalaya saha profayilwala hamuda nila andumin sarasi wiwidha thorathuru pracharaya karagenu labe.
“punchi kale meka apita hari wadayak wuna.
eeta passe ithinwade iwari kiyala hitha gannako.
winadi dahayak pamana ikibinda eka digata andannata wuyeya.
penkar saha wellar ganga athara pihiti chola mandalam namathi suwishala pradeshaya owun wisin palanaya karanu labini.
kampas eke kulturkarayo kiyana yeduma tikak parana ekak.
“mahathma gandhi samastha manawa wargaya wenuwen prakasha kala ee manawawadi wadan pela madhyawediyaku madhya pilibanda hadarannaku washayen obatada adala bawa sithanna.”
lamayi hitapu gaman paninawa.
wyawastha sanshodhanaya harima gatalu sahagathayi.
aluthen ekathu wima walakinawa.
manda mandagami antharjala sambandhatha wegayak athi aya wisin mema protokolaya bhawitha karanuye pudumayak nowe.
me lipiya mama dakke gosip sayit ekaka thibila.
kandayam athin dushanaya wunu, polisiyen nosahenta guti kapu, yuddheta giya aya wage kattiya siya diwi hani karaganne nathuwa innawa.
mita amatharawa protin adangu aahara ha witamin ee adangu aahara itha wadagath we.
aayurweda kshethraya sadaha awashya rasa beheth nishpadanayata kansa, abin hingawima gataluwak bawa aayurweda waidyawarun saukhya amathyawarayata penwa di atha.
- widi dige sarisarana jangama babar kiyayi
suwarda ee athi kiyala...
oyata pin sidda weyi..
eewa padanam karagena liyannako lipi malawak.
indiyan oyil samagama wisin thrikunamalaya warayata genwana lada petral thogaya sambandhayen wishesha parikshawak sidukarana bawa lanka khanija thel nithigatha sansthawa niwedanaya kara thibini.
” mimosa gananakata nathuwa
sudupusi mehema kiwwath eyage mune thibune kalakirunu penumak.

anika man aluth parapurata atha denna lasthiyi. 1989 agra sajiwani, dewika karunarathna, liliyan edirisinha, parl wasudewi wage prawina ha jyeshta shilpiniyo ranga pa mage ‘soldara gedara’ wedika natyaya sandaha man dan aluth parapura sambandha karagannawa.
‘ho chi min’ da warin wara me bim gewal thula wasaya kale ya.
yam aanduwak bandi sitinne ema ayithiya thawaduratath pulul kirima sandahayi.
onna me para kella wijayage ganga addara sinduwata kamathiwela thatiyath gaththa..
ee bawa api kihipa wathawak ma pennum kalemu.
mama oba wetha ennam
anthima dawaseth bahala wada neda goyiyo api nam paswenida nawaththuwa sori machan kuwet wala inna umbaata nathiunata apita ape rata watinawa.
ehenam guruwarun gawa gunawathkamath thiyennama oonaya.
